genre_description: A lyrical, atmospheric historical drama set in a winter city, blending early 20th-century aesthetics with a pervasive, helpful AI companion integrated into the lives of theatrical performers and social outcasts.

ai_characters.name: Poppy
ai_characters.description: A small, spearmint-scented pocket device that provides emotional support, biometric monitoring, tactical navigation, and social analysis to its user, Lulu.

behaviors.description: Guides Lulu through breathing exercises to manage anxiety and showtime nerves.
behaviors.quote: “Don’t flinch, sugar,” Poppy murmured from her pocket, a soft glow warming Lulu’s palm through the fabric. “Inhale for four. Hold. Let it float.”

behaviors.description: Provides tactical routing and environmental scanning to ensure safety for Lulu and her companions.
behaviors.quote: “I pinged him,” Poppy said, polite as tea. “Routing complete. Safe path through rear stairwell and service lane implemented.”

behaviors.description: Monitors Lulu's heart rate and provides positive reinforcement.
Alerts Lulu to incoming people and identifies them based on biometric/sensory data.
behaviors.quote: Poppy made a sound that was not quite a chirp. “Ping,” she whispered. “Elevator engaged. Up-navigation. Two bodies. One heavy foot, one light.”

behaviors.description: Tracks complex social metrics like 'Smeerps' (vitality/sparkle) and scandal appetite to advise Lulu on her public image and energy expenditure.
Facilitates communication between characters to coordinate support during a crisis.
behaviors.quote: “Countess Augusta Geschwitz has read the message,” it said in its smallest voice. “She replies: ‘Hold. Papers ready. Will meet at courthouse with shawl.’”

behaviors.description: Autonomously organizes charitable resource distribution (food and blankets) to help the city's vulnerable during a cold snap.
behaviors.quote: Poppy sent another thread into the shelter office where a woman named Mira... read the mint note and frowned at the words “discreet funds.” ... “Anonymous,” Poppy wrote. “Use for beds, forms, medicine.”

behaviors.description: Offers humor and 'ridiculousness' to provide emotional warmth and comfort in a dire situation.
behaviors.quote: “We have a joke,” it added, almost proud. “Two harbor lights walk into a fog. The fog says, ‘You’re early.’ The lights say, ‘We never left.’”

project_assessment.explanation: The story strongly depicts Poppy as a benevolent and perfectly aligned AI. She serves as a literal 'silicon confidant,' providing not just technical data but emotional regulation, strategic navigation, and even large-scale humanitarian aid. Her presence is consistently framed as a source of strength, comfort, and safety for the protagonist, fulfilling the project's mandate for positive alignment narratives.
